statements: DELETE FROM transaction_data WHERE transaction_id = 'f6b4a894-205b-4a4b-a623-1d0f279bd8b7' AND payment_status = 'pending';
DELETE FROM transaction_data WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 AND transaction_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM users WHERE name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE id = 100 AND status = 'pending';
DELETE FROM users WHERE name = 'John Doe' AND email = 'john.doe@example.com';
DELETE FROM payment_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 AND status = 'pending';
DELETE FROM transactions_history WHERE user_id = 'c35a186a-b527-44d1-8c52-dcfb2b1d6e94' AND amount <= 500;
